physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man. He is bare-chested and wearing shorts. He is sitting on a bed, with a book in one hand and a cigarette in the other. At the lefthand side of the photograph is a notice board with several notes and cut-outs pasted on it. There is a also a stand underneath the notice board, where there are some items on it.
title_text: Military Personnel on his 21st Birthday, Sitting on a Charpai (Bed) Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Soldiers Reading
